Shinki launches a wave of [[Iron Sand]] to descend upon his target. It is similar to [[Gaara]]'s [[Quicksand Waterfall Flow]], but on a much smaller scale. He can also use this technique to [[Sand Binding Coffin|bind]] a target and [[Sand Waterfall Funeral|crush]] them.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 60</ref>
